alert.note: Alert for Kit Carson County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 2:11PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Kit Carson County through 245 PM MDT... At 210 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Seibert, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Seibert around 215 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Vona. This includes Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 400 and 416. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
